thread.title: Did Mama June exaggerate her weight loss with 'fat suit'? | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Did Mama June exaggerate her weight loss with 'fat suit'? | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Did Mama June exaggerate her weight loss with 'fat suit'? | Daily Mail Online
text: Share Mama June weighed an incredible 406lbs before she underwent weight loss surgery. She is now said to be a svelte size four, but has yet to reveal her new figure publicly. Something doesn't look right... Online fans pointed out that something just looked off about June's face and chin during Friday's From Not To Hot premiere Before and after? Lots of fans pointed out that the star's starkly different hair color and strange looking double chin probably meant some of the show's 'before' scenes were filmed after the star already slimmed down. Was it real? Many viewers suggested that the 37-year-old reality star was wearing a prosthetic chin in scenes that were supposed to be from 'before' Mama June's tremendous weight loss Many fans watching Friday's show pointed to the 37-year-old's neck as the most suspect part of the supposed special effects. 'The prosthetics work is horrible. They should gotten the costume designer from The Nutty Professor or Norbit,' posted a user with the handle @MzSexyTrini. Other critiques were more simple, with one user opting for a blunt 'WTF?!' and some laughing with tears emojis, while another just wrote 'Prosthetics????' accompanied by a picture of June from the Friday episode. Fan opinions: Twitter had tons of opinions about the star's supposed fake fat Side eye: One Twitter user asked the show creator's who they thought they were fooling with the reported 'fat suit' 'When your fake fat chin won't stop peeling off' joked another user. Another tweeter gave Mama June's fat suit the meme treatment, saying 'Who does @WEtv & the makers of this show tin they're fooling . That's a fat suit #MamaJune,' and added a gif of Viola Davis giving a mean side eye. Mama June: From Not To Hot tells the story of the reality star's mission to get a 'revenge body' after her breakup with longtime sweetheart Mike 'Sugar Bear' Thompson. That feeling when... Mama June's supposedly fake fat inspired many jokes from the show's viewers Great start! The WE tv show started strong, earning the fourth spot on Twitter's trending list And even with a mild controversy, Mama June and WEtv have many reasons to be celebrating last night's premiere. The show's premiere had tons of viewers, with the hashtag #MamaJune rising to number four on Twitter's trending list, according to a tweet from June herself. She also thanked fans and urged them to tune in again, saying 'Thanks for watching n hope u watch next wk at the same time' while also tagging her agent @MsGinaRodriguez in the tweet. Fans can follow the Georgia born gal's journey From Not To Hot on Fridays at 10pm ET on WEtv. Dabbling in diets: The first episode of Mama June: From Not To Hot shows the reality star struggling to find motivation to stick to her diet and forge healthy habits Comfort food: The reality star had trouble staying away from old favorites like biscuits and friend chicken while trying to start her diet Wise little one: In the show's premiere, the charismatic young Alana 'Honey Boo Boo' Thompson told her mom she likes her 'just the way you are' but said she understands why her mom is ready to make a change Share or comment on this article 90
